title: Game.of.Thrones.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Game.of.Thrones.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Year: 2012
Genre: RPG / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Cyanide Studio
Publisher: Focus Home Interactive
Published in Russia: 1C-SoftClub
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language:Eng  | Rus
Voice Language:Eng  | Rus
Crack: PROPHET

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7
Processor: Dual Core from AMD or Intel, with a clock frequency of 2.2 GHz
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB compatible with DirectX 9 shaders third model (ATi Radeon HD 2600 XT, nVIDIA GeForce 7900 GTX or higher)
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 4.5 GB

Description:

Game based on the epic saga of George Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire, 
in Russia known as the "Song of Ice and Fire", won the hearts of millions 
of fans around the fantasy world. Books dispersed around the world sold more 
than 15 million copies, and the TV series "Game of Thrones," based on the 
first volume of the saga, instantly won acclaim of audiences and critics.
"Game of Thrones" is perhaps the most ambitious project of Cyanide Studio: 

game created by the graphics engine Unreal Engine 3, and the script was written 
for her under the leadership of George Martin. Without a doubt, an adventure in 
one of the most detailed game universes will bring a lot of fun and the fans of 
the famous saga, fans and RPG, and connoisseurs of quality medieval fantasy.

You have a choice of two characters: Morse, loyal to the Night's Watch, and Alistair, 
the red priest, who returned to Vasteras from long exile in search of redemption. 
The game begins immediately after the Hand of King Robert Baratheon bye to life. 
Our heroes find themselves embroiled in a very complicated story, which will 
hold them in very different corners of Westeros - from King's Landing to the 
immense ice walls. In each of them travels to meet with famous personalities, 
including the treacherous Queen Cersei; dodgy Varis nicknamed Spider severe 
Dzhior Mormont, Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

Features:

Choose a hero and his class, define his fighting style, achieve a balance 
between strengths and weaknesses. Get ready for an epic battle!

Look, buy or mined in battle armor and weapons that are most appropriate 
under prevailing style of fighting, improve their skills and, of course, 
do not miss the opportunity to learn new ones.

Slow progress of the battle to analyze the situation and think about 
the next step. And do not forget: the game of thrones talent policy 
is often lethal to the sword, so that your eloquence at times may be 
the only salvation in a critical situation.

Features repack

Game of Thrones
Version of the game - v1.5.0.0
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:

Beyond the Wall (Blood Bound) DLC;
Weapon Pack DLC;
Dog Pack DLC
